title: I need help with my champion pool
body: so, my champion pool consists of talon and heimerdonger so far. i need suggestions for another champion which would balance it out. I like champions with linear skillshots.

replies.body: Nidalee has a linear skill shot, you just have to get used to your kit and watch out for lee syndrome.
You can try zed, leblanc and cass. They have skill shot and have similar play style with talon.
Talon is very strong if you know how to play him I think I have lost lane 3 times with him
i reckon talon is very sleeper
talon op. Yasuo oper (if you can use him properly) then there is ezreal linear skillshot x3

If you wanna be cancer i'd suggest nidalee, despite her strengths spears are not always easy to land, but you can easy burst your target if you land one. In fact any of the "land Q to unlock gapcloser" squad might be good for you. E.g. thresh, lee sin, diana
xerath, his q is a line (lol)
forgive me im lazy and i cant be bothered to right an essay
